jobs.description:
Who we are
elyps is an invite-only fintech super app combining a neobank with a lifestyle marketplace, gathering a community of users caring about global warming.
All elyps customers are shareholders, for free.

Our History
Early 2017, when he discovered blockchain technology, Vincent decided to leave San Francisco to return to Europe to create elyps. After having met the Belgian financial authorities in late 2017 to create a new kind of bank, Mat, a Mobile & Fintech specialist joined Vincent to found elyps. After 30 months of fury, elyps is ready to launch!

Our Mission
Have a positive climate impact by influencing daily actions through behavioral and transactional data.

Manifesto
‚Ä¢ Just focus on users interest
‚Ä¢ Consider users as important as you¬†
‚Ä¢ Do everything impossible to save time and improve the lifestyle of our users
‚Ä¢ Offer free equity to users to install an unwavering trust¬†
‚Ä¢ Gather our community around a common mission
‚Ä¢ Influence global warming reduction
‚Ä¢ Decentralisation is the new freedom
‚Ä¢ 10 times better is not enough
‚Ä¢ High motivation and overdelivery are essential

The Opportunity
We‚Äôre looking for an innovative Information Security Lead who will play a strategical role in defining and assessing our security strategy, architecture and practices.

Reporting to the Chief Technology Officer, you will be tasked to ensure compliance with European regulations on all levels with regard to information security and cyber risk, helping Elyps to achieve the goal of building the trustest banking products within the industry.


What you will be doing
- You will collaborate with the CTO on the design and implementation of Elyps' information security strategy that will be aligned with our organizational priorities.
- You will liaise with the engineering team to build alignment between the security and the architecture of our products, thus ensuring that security is built in by design.
- You will determine baseline security configuration standards for operating systems, network segmentation, and identity and access management.
- You will work with the compliance team to ensure that all information owned, collected or controlled by or on behalf of Elyps is processed and stored in accordance with applicable laws and other global regulatory requirements.
- You will define and facilitate the processes for information security for risk, legal and regulatory assessments, including the reporting and oversight of treatment efforts to address negative findings.
- You will develop and maintain a document framework of continuously up-to-date information security policies, standards and guidelines.
- You will facilitate metrics and reporting frameworks to measure the efficiency and the effectiveness of the security program.
- You will coordinate with DevOps teams to advocate secure coding practices and escalate concerns related to poor coding practices to the CTO.
- You will implement and manage information security incidents and events to protect corporate IT assets, intellectual property, regulated data and Elyps' reputation.
- You will monitor the external threat environment for emerging threats and advise the appropriate courses of action.
- You will create and manage a targeted information security awareness training program, ensure the consistent application of policies and standards.
- You will review security technologies, tools and services, and make recommendations to the broader security team for their use based on security, financial and operational metrics.


What you need to be successful
-   


Your Background
- You have a minimum of 8 years experience in an Information Security role and at least 3 years in Cloud Security.
- You have the experience of designing the deployment of native applications and infrastructure into public cloud services such as AWS and/or GCP.
- You hold one or more of the following industry certifications, CISA, CISM and/or CISSP.
- You have experience in developing and documenting security architecture and plans, including strategic, tactical and project plans.


Your Hard Skills
- You have hands-on leadership experience in security control appliances and services: anti-malware, network access controls, SIEM, etc.
- You have hands-on experience in system technology security testing (vulnerability scanning and penetration testing).
- You have a strong understanding of microservices architecture and working with scalable software.
- You have a good track record in implementing and working under ISO 27001 and PCI-DSS compliance.
- You proof having an excellent understanding of information security concepts, protocols, and follow industry best practices and strategies.
- You have the ability for long-term strategic thinking balanced with near-term execution skills.
- You have exceptional communication skills and the ability to influence from vendors to senior stakeholders at board level.
- You have the desire to solve problems whilst wanting to inspire and share your knowledge and passion for FinTech.


 Your Soft Skills
- Customer centric
- Environmental awareness
- Motivation
- Autonomy
- Resilience
- Flexibility
- Problem solving
- Teamwork
- Initiative
- Innovation
- Resourcefulness
- Curiosity
- Critical thinking
- Aspiration & Self Improvement
- Scalability
- Inspire people
- Leadership
- Growth mindset
- Focus mastery
- Stress-Management
- Get Comfortable with Chaos
- Culture awareness


Compensation & Benefits
- **Package : 140,000 ‚Ç¨ - 180,000 ‚Ç¨** 
- Our gross salary range for the role is 70,000 ‚Ç¨ - 90,000 ‚Ç¨ per annum depending on experience
- Stock Options: We double your gross salary with stock options
- Biannual equity bonuses
- The latest Apple MacBook and 27' screen with comfort view
- Roll with a free elyps Premium subscription
- 1 day of remote work per week
- 5 to 10 days off in addition to the statutory holidays
- Pension plan
- Private Health Insurance
- Relocation package and visa sponsorship for international talents (we already have 8+ nationalities)
- Additional employee benefits coming soon


Hiring Process
- Video-call interview with our talent acquisition manager (30 min approx.)
- Video-call interview with your future manager (45 min. approx.)
- A home-task / Business case challenge to evaluate your hard skills¬†
- Onsite interviews with future team members (1:30 hours approx.)
- Meeting with Founders
- Offer follows within 48 hours


Thank you for considering to join elyps. We cannot wait to learn more about you!

elyps has a growing-team working behind the scene with an extensive experience in financial services and the expertise of successfully dealing with the pains of scaling high-growth tech products.

You will be working in a fast-paced environment with talented and ambitious people, all passionate in taking part of building a game-changing company that impacts positively on people‚Äôs lives. We are devoted to build a diverse work environment where our employees are motivated and proud every single day.

jobs.title: Lead Blockchain Developer üåê üí≥
jobs.description:
We‚Äôre looking for a Lead Blockchain Developer experienced in developing and scaling financial solutions with global exposure to different regulated environments. We are seeking a problem solver who enjoys collaborating across teams. We are looking for a transparent communicator even when it is challenging, seeking to surround herself/himself with like-minded people. 
At the beginning of your journey at Elyps, you will work directly with the CTO designing and implementing decentralized applications that will support millions of transactions of our global user base. As we get ready for our launch in Q2, you will have the mission to build the best in class team of Blockchain Developers team with the purpose to build a scalable blockchain architecture that will support the offering of all our financial service products internationally. 
At Elyps, we encourage all our employees to have an effective positive attitude that shows we all care about each others' concerns, finding the way to tackle challenges in the best way possible as we keep moving forward with our mission of building one of the most secure and scalable banking products within the FinTech space.

**What your day will look like** 
- You will take ownership of designing and implementing decentralised applications built on blockchain technology that will improve Elyps' product offering.
- You will design and develop the smart contract ecosystem and create POC's based on potential areas of success within Elyps.
- You will work with backend and infrastructure teams to make sure the blockchain ecosystem fit nicely within the infrastructure, and scalability/reliability is designed and implemented from scratch.
- As we scale, you will build and mentor a team of highly skilled blockchain developers, creating a culture of low stress and growth-oriented.
- You will identify training and development opportunities for your team, encouraging them to be the best version of themselves.
- You build tools for yourself and others to increase efficiency and to make hard or repetitive tasks easy and quick.
- You will continuously explore new technologies that will delight the user experience of Elyps customers, being at the forefront of a rapidly changing digital environment.

**Your Skills**
- You bring extensive years of designing and developing large scale, high availability software applications in Go, JavaScript and/or Java, preferably for banking or payments companies.
- You have 1+years of Bytecode, Ethereum, Geth, Hyperledger, Infura, Parity, Quorum, Solidity, Truffle or other blockchain platforms and technologies.
- You have a robust understanding of¬†algorithms, cryptography, distributed systems architecture, security and data structures.
- You have hands-on experience in cryptography such as digital signature, encryption based on asymmetric or symmetric keys, key agreement.
- You have a good understanding of cloud platforms, preferably GCP and you are familiarised with CI and/or CD.
- You have experience building and mentoring teams of skilled developers creating innovative and forward-thinking digital products for consumers.
- You want to work in a startup environment because you like the idea of doing a bit of everything.
- You like to take ownership of your work and you are accountable for it.

jobs.title: Product Designer üé®
jobs.description:
As a Product Designer, you will be involved in every aspect of the product design process, from brainstorming the next great product innovation to tweaking pixels right before launch. In this role, you will define and drive the future of design across our web and products and you will be expected to utilize your full range of product design, interaction design, and visual design skills.

We are looking for someone who is passionate about developing strategies based off of insights of real people and has the mastery of their craft to turn these insights into beautifully designed solutions.

**What your day will look like**
- You will create simple and intuitive experiences by distilling product requirements and user goals into sketches, wireframes, and prototypes and continuously iterating to meet customer needs.
- You will use your deep user empathy and situational awareness to craft workflows that help users glide through the challenges of using new technology. 
- You will partner closely with the wider design team, engineering, product, and business folks to find elegant but practical solutions to design challenges.
- You will take full ownership of your work, and you take responsibility for every last detail, every step of the way. 
- You will rapidly produce multiple concepts and prototypes; knowing when to apply pixel-perfect attention to detail, and when to make low-fi sketches and prototypes.
- You will articulate and evangelize design decisions performing user testing, analyze feedback, data and iterate!
- You will care about elyps users and want to blow their mind with an app experience they would never expect from a financial services product.

**Your Skills**
- You have 3+ years of experience designing at consumer-focused tech companies or high growth startups, as a Product Designer, UX Designer and/or Digital Designer. 
- You have commercial experience with design and prototyping tools such as Sketch, Photoshop, Invision, Figma Framer, or Principle.

In this role, you will define and drive the future of design across our web and products and you will be expected to utilize your full range of product design, interaction design, and visual design skills.

We are looking for someone who is passionate about developing strategies based off of insights of real people and has the mastery of their craft to turn these insights into beautifully designed solutions.

What your day will look like

  • You will create simple and intuitive experiences by distilling product requirements and user goals into sketches, wireframes, and prototypes and continuously iterating to meet customer needs.

‚Ä¢ 10 times better is not enough

The Opportunity
You are the champion of your region. You spend your days on the front lines on campus recruiting and motivating your troops and encouraging our Students Brand Managers.
You organize and manage events with your teams to exceed your objectives.
You give wings to our users by inviting them and making them discover elyps.
A job where you sit at your desk every day is not for you. You would much rather be at the scene to implement the strategies that you have developed. As Field Marketing Manager you design the local face of elyps in your area and align it with our national and global strategies. You are responsible for creating and implementing marketing initiatives in the main areas of our marketing mix, using new channels and taking the needs and peculiarities of your region into account. In order to attract local consumers, you build strong online and offline networks and work together with opinion leaders and important influencers, for example.



What you will be doing
- You will conquer campuses in your region
- You will build and manage a team of Student Brand Managers within the campus to be our ambassadors on field.
- You will conduct the entire sales cycle : prospection, acquisition and retention
- You will set up and deploy a strategy so that students use elyps and can pay everywhere with our super app.
- You will get the great opportunity to be responsible for our growth in your region by driving the business development strategy from the B2C side and potential partnerships coming along the way.
- You will represent Elyps as a brand ambassador, with a comprehensive understanding of our product offering.


What you need to be successful
- **Strategic focus and brand priorities**
What is important - and what can wait? It is your responsibility to set the right priorities and thus develop the optimal strategy to best carry the elyps philosophy into your region. You ensure that we understand the needs of our consumers and thus lay the foundation for local idea generation and implementation. With your creative marketing minimum, you are constantly looking for new ideas and programs that strengthen our external image and help in close cooperation with the marketing specialists to increase understanding of product functionality at the local level. As the mouthpiece of your region, you pass on the knowledge you have gained about consumers and our competition to the national team. In close cooperation with the regional sales team, you develop the annual business plan for your region and implement it independently. You always keep an eye on the priorities and the overarching elyps philosophy. Tailor-made for the respective consumer occasions, you develop suitable communication strategies and strengthen the campaigns in order to activate the right, big moments in the region and increase our relevance.  
- **Your perfect team**
You can identify perfectly with our values ‚Äã‚Äãand act as a role model to inspire and motivate your team with our philosophy. With your expertise in recruiting, hiring and training, you manage to put together the perfect team of field marketing specialists and manage them. You will then pass these skills on to your team so that they can optimally select and train their own teams of students. You have an eye for the talents and potentials in your team and manage to optimally promote and develop them through continuous support. You set the goals for your colleagues so that their performance is objectively traceable, support them in achieving the agreed results and are then responsible for their performance evaluation.  
- **Activate the "Local Pride"**
Every local consumer and media landscape has its own needs and peculiarities. You have the right feeling for this and support local key events and initiatives that focus on participation. Every contact with our brand becomes an unforgettable experience thanks to your first-class planning, execution and your attention to detail. In all of this, you always keep an eye on consumers and the brand and ensure that we reach our target group online in the most effective way. Not only at our own but also at selected third-party events, you increase the visibility of our brand and determine the ideal level of brand support and branding so that elyps shows the optimal presence in all relevant scenes. This is where your networking talent is needed: You build sustainable relationships with the most important players in the region. You work with opinion leaders, various media and local authorities, as well as with entrepreneurs and start-up communities and always manage to keep an overview.  
- **Marketing innovations**
Standstill is a foreign word for you. You are always on the move, keep up with the times and understand the latest trends. It is particularly important to you to be close to the consumer, which is why you can easily make contacts in a wide variety of scenes. You involve the local student marketing team in the brainstorming process on the spot and are close to campus life with them to track down digitally and socially motivated consumer trends and integrate them into your strategies. You also think outside the box and create new, innovative ideas to bring the brand to life. You make sure that digital and social media are at the center of every field marketing activity.

Your Experience
- You already have demonstrable experience in marketing, ideally in the sports, event or culture area. Your heart beats especially for field marketing.
- You have also gained extensive experience in people management and have acquired expertise in hiring, training and motivating team leadership.
- Ideally, you have already worked with commercial teams in sales or trade marketing.
- You know how to negotiate and manage budgets.
- You are strong in networking - with your excellent communication skills you can inspire people and open doors.
- As a multi-tasking talent, you keep many balls in the air at the same time and can effortlessly work with different personalities from different fields.
- You are a real leader and a talent when it comes to organise and manage an event.
- You have a good understanding of current consumer trends and insights in the tech, sports and culture area in your region.
- You are a real marketing talent with a deep understanding of brand and a spirit of innovation in your blood. You like to implement your ideas proactively and quickly.
- Thanks to your talent for communication, it is easy for you to hold presentations in front of an audience and to adapt to your audience again and again.

Have a positive climate impact by influencing daily actions through behavioral and transactional data.

Manifesto
‚Ä¢ Just focus on users interest
‚Ä¢ Consider users as important as you
‚Ä¢ Do everything impossible to save time and improve the lifestyle of our users
‚Ä¢ Offer free equity to users to install an unwavering trust
‚Ä¢ Gather our community around a common mission
‚Ä¢ Influence global warming reduction
‚Ä¢ Decentralisation is the new freedom
‚Ä¢ 10 times better is not enough
‚Ä¢ High motivation and overdelivery are essential

The Opportunity
You are the champion of your region. You spend your days on the front lines on campus recruiting and motivating your troops and encouraging our Students Brand Managers.
You organize and manage events with your teams to exceed your objectives.
You give wings to our users by inviting them and making them discover elyps.
A job where you sit at your desk every day is not for you. You would much rather be at the scene to implement the strategies that you have developed. As Field Marketing Manager you design the local face of elyps in your area and align it with our national and global strategies. You are responsible for creating and implementing marketing initiatives in the main areas of our marketing mix, using new channels and taking the needs and peculiarities of your region into account. In order to attract local consumers, you build strong online and offline networks and work together with opinion leaders and important influencers, for example.

What you will be doing

  • You will conquer campuses in your region
  • You will build and manage a team of Student Brand Managers within the campus to be our ambassadors on field.
  • You will conduct the entire sales cycle : prospection, acquisition and retention
  • You will set up and deploy a strategy so that students use elyps and can pay everywhere with our super app.
  • You will get the great opportunity to be responsible for our growth in your region by driving the business development strategy from the B2C side and potential partnerships coming along the way.
  • You will represent Elyps as a brand ambassador, with a comprehensive understanding of our product offering.

What you need to be successful

  • Strategic focus and brand priorities What is important - and what can wait? It is your responsibility to set the right priorities and thus develop the optimal strategy to best carry the elyps philosophy into your region. You ensure that we understand the needs of our consumers and thus lay the foundation for local idea generation and implementation. With your creative marketing minimum, you are constantly looking for new ideas and programs that strengthen our external image and help in close cooperation with the marketing specialists to increase understanding of product functionality at the local level. As the mouthpiece of your region, you pass on the knowledge you have gained about consumers and our competition to the national team. In close cooperation with the regional sales team, you develop the annual business plan for your region and implement it independently. You always keep an eye on the priorities and the overarching elyps philosophy. Tailor-made for the respective consumer occasions, you develop suitable communication strategies and strengthen the campaigns in order to activate the right, big moments in the region and increase our relevance.
  • Your perfect team You can identify perfectly with our values ‚Äã‚Äãand act as a role model to inspire and motivate your team with our philosophy. With your expertise in recruiting, hiring and training, you manage to put together the perfect team of field marketing specialists and manage them. You will then pass these skills on to your team so that they can optimally select and train their own teams of students. You have an eye for the talents and potentials in your team and manage to optimally promote and develop them through continuous support. You set the goals for your colleagues so that their performance is objectively traceable, support them in achieving the agreed results and are then responsible for their performance evaluation.
  • Activate the "Local Pride" Every local consumer and media landscape has its own needs and peculiarities. You have the right feeling for this and support local key events and initiatives that focus on participation. Every contact with our brand becomes an unforgettable experience thanks to your first-class planning, execution and your attention to detail. In all of this, you always keep an eye on consumers and the brand and ensure that we reach our target group online in the most effective way. Not only at our own but also at selected third-party events, you increase the visibility of our brand and determine the ideal level of brand support and branding so that elyps shows the optimal presence in all relevant scenes. This is where your networking talent is needed: You build sustainable relationships with the most important players in the region. You work with opinion leaders, various media and local authorities, as well as with entrepreneurs and start-up communities and always manage to keep an overview.
  • Marketing innovations Standstill is a foreign word for you. You are always on the move, keep up with the times and understand the latest trends. It is particularly important to you to be close to the consumer, which is why you can easily make contacts in a wide variety of scenes. You involve the local student marketing team in the brainstorming process on the spot and are close to campus life with them to track down digitally and socially motivated consumer trends and integrate them into your strategies. You also think outside the box and create new, innovative ideas to bring the brand to life. You make sure that digital and social media are at the center of every field marketing activity.

Your Experience

  • You already have demonstrable experience in marketing, ideally in the sports, event or culture area. Your heart beats especially for field marketing.
  • You have also gained extensive experience in people management and have acquired expertise in hiring, training and motivating team leadership.
  • Ideally, you have already worked with commercial teams in sales or trade marketing.
  • You know how to negotiate and manage budgets.
  • You are strong in networking - with your excellent communication skills you can inspire people and open doors.
  • As a multi-tasking talent, you keep many balls in the air at the same time and can effortlessly work with different personalities from different fields.
  • You are a real leader and a talent when it comes to organise and manage an event.
  • You have a good understanding of current consumer trends and insights in the tech, sports and culture area in your region.
  • You are a real marketing talent with a deep understanding of brand and a spirit of innovation in your blood. You like to implement your ideas proactively and quickly.

  • Thanks to your talent for communication, it is easy for you to hold presentations in front of an audience and to adapt to your audience again and again.

  • Successfully completed studies in marketing, business administration, event management or similar

  • You are a native French/Dutch speaker.

  • Fluent in written and spoken English.

- You will conquer campuses in your region

- You will set up and deploy a strategy so that students use elyps and can pay everywhere with our super app.
- You will get the great opportunity to be responsible for our growth in your region by driving the business development strategy from the B2C side and potential partnerships coming along the way.
- You will represent Elyps as a brand ambassador, with a comprehensive understanding of our product offering.


What you need to be successful
- **Strategic focus and brand priorities**
What is important - and what can wait? It is your responsibility to set the right priorities and thus develop the optimal strategy to best carry the elyps philosophy into your region. You ensure that we understand the needs of our consumers and thus lay the foundation for local idea generation and implementation. With your creative marketing minimum, you are constantly looking for new ideas and programs that strengthen our external image and help in close cooperation with the marketing specialists to increase understanding of product functionality at the local level. As the mouthpiece of your region, you pass on the knowledge you have gained about consumers and our competition to the national team. In close cooperation with the regional sales team, you develop the annual business plan for your region and implement it independently. You always keep an eye on the priorities and the overarching elyps philosophy. Tailor-made for the respective consumer occasions, you develop suitable communication strategies and strengthen the campaigns in order to activate the right, big moments in the region and increase our relevance.  
- **Your perfect team**

With your expertise in recruiting, hiring and training, you manage to put together the perfect team of field marketing specialists and manage them. You will then pass these skills on to your team so that they can optimally select and train their own teams of students. You have an eye for the talents and potentials in your team and manage to optimally promote and develop them through continuous support. You set the goals for your colleagues so that their performance is objectively traceable, support them in achieving the agreed results and are then responsible for their performance evaluation.  
- **Activate the "Local Pride"**
Every local consumer and media landscape has its own needs and peculiarities. You have the right feeling for this and support local key events and initiatives that focus on participation. Every contact with our brand becomes an unforgettable experience thanks to your first-class planning, execution and your attention to detail. In all of this, you always keep an eye on consumers and the brand and ensure that we reach our target group online in the most effective way. Not only at our own but also at selected third-party events, you increase the visibility of our brand and determine the ideal level of brand support and branding so that elyps shows the optimal presence in all relevant scenes. This is where your networking talent is needed: You build sustainable relationships with the most important players in the region. You work with opinion leaders, various media and local authorities, as well as with entrepreneurs and start-up communities and always manage to keep an overview.  
- **Marketing innovations**
Standstill is a foreign word for you. You are always on the move, keep up with the times and understand the latest trends. It is particularly important to you to be close to the consumer, which is why you can easily make contacts in a wide variety of scenes. You involve the local student marketing team in the brainstorming process on the spot and are close to campus life with them to track down digitally and socially motivated consumer trends and integrate them into your strategies. You also think outside the box and create new, innovative ideas to bring the brand to life. You make sure that digital and social media are at the center of every field marketing activity.

- You already have demonstrable experience in marketing, ideally in the sports, event or culture area. Your heart beats especially for field marketing.
- You have also gained extensive experience in people management and have acquired expertise in hiring, training and motivating team leadership.
- Ideally, you have already worked with commercial teams in sales or trade marketing.
- You know how to negotiate and manage budgets.
- You are strong in networking - with your excellent communication skills you can inspire people and open doors.
- As a multi-tasking talent, you keep many balls in the air at the same time and can effortlessly work with different personalities from different fields.
- You are a real leader and a talent when it comes to organise and manage an event.
- You have a good understanding of current consumer trends and insights in the tech, sports and culture area in your region.
- You are a real marketing talent with a deep understanding of brand and a spirit of innovation in your blood. You like to implement your ideas proactively and quickly.
- Thanks to your talent for communication, it is easy for you to hold presentations in front of an audience and to adapt to your audience again and again.
  
- Successfully completed studies in marketing, business administration, event management or similar
- You are a native French/Dutch speaker.
- Fluent in written and spoken English.
- Travel up to: 80%

- **Package : 70,000 ‚Ç¨ - 100,000 ‚Ç¨** 
- Our gross salary range for the role is 35,000 ‚Ç¨ - 50,000 ‚Ç¨ per annum depending on experience
- Stock Options: We double your gross salary with stock options
- Biannual equity bonuses
- The latest Apple MacBook and 27' screen with comfort view
- Roll with a free elyps Premium subscription
- 1 day of remote work per week
- 5 to 10 days off in addition to the statutory holidays
- Pension plan
- Private Health Insurance
- Relocation package and visa sponsorship for international talents (we already have 8+ nationalities)
- Additional employee benefits coming soon


Hiring Process
- Video-call interview with our talent acquisition manager (30 min approx.)

After 30 months of fury, elyps is ready to launch!

Our Mission
Have a positive climate impact by influencing daily actions through behavioral and transactional data.

Manifesto
‚Ä¢ Just focus on users interest
‚Ä¢ Consider users as important as you¬†
‚Ä¢ Do everything impossible to save time and improve the lifestyle of our users
‚Ä¢ Offer free equity to users to install an unwavering trust¬†
‚Ä¢ Gather our community around a common mission
‚Ä¢ Influence global warming reduction
‚Ä¢ Decentralisation is the new freedom
‚Ä¢ 10 times better is not enough
‚Ä¢ High motivation and overdelivery are essential

The Opportunity
You are the champion of your region. You spend your days on the front lines on campus recruiting and motivating your troops and encouraging our Students Brand Managers.
You organize and manage events with your teams to exceed your objectives.
You give wings to our users by inviting them and making them discover elyps.
A job where you sit at your desk every day is not for you. You would much rather be at the scene to implement the strategies that you have developed. As Field Marketing Manager you design the local face of elyps in your area and align it with our national and global strategies. You are responsible for creating and implementing marketing initiatives in the main areas of our marketing mix, using new channels and taking the needs and peculiarities of your region into account. In order to attract local consumers, you build strong online and offline networks and work together with opinion leaders and important influencers, for example.



What you will be doing
- You will conquer campuses in your region
- You will build and manage a team of Student Brand Managers within the campus to be our ambassadors on field.
- You will conduct the entire sales cycle : prospection, acquisition and retention
- You will set up and deploy a strategy so that students use elyps and can pay everywhere with our super app.
- You will get the great opportunity to be responsible for our growth in your region by driving the business development strategy from the B2C side and potential partnerships coming along the way.
- You will represent Elyps as a brand ambassador, with a comprehensive understanding of our product offering.


What you need to be successful
- **Strategic focus and brand priorities**
What is important - and what can wait? It is your responsibility to set the right priorities and thus develop the optimal strategy to best carry the elyps philosophy into your region. You ensure that we understand the needs of our consumers and thus lay the foundation for local idea generation and implementation. With your creative marketing minimum, you are constantly looking for new ideas and programs that strengthen our external image and help in close cooperation with the marketing specialists to increase understanding of product functionality at the local level. As the mouthpiece of your region, you pass on the knowledge you have gained about consumers and our competition to the national team. In close cooperation with the regional sales team, you develop the annual business plan for your region and implement it independently. You always keep an eye on the priorities and the overarching elyps philosophy. Tailor-made for the respective consumer occasions, you develop suitable communication strategies and strengthen the campaigns in order to activate the right, big moments in the region and increase our relevance.  
- **Your perfect team**
You can identify perfectly with our values ‚Äã‚Äãand act as a role model to inspire and motivate your team with our philosophy. With your expertise in recruiting, hiring and training, you manage to put together the perfect team of field marketing specialists and manage them. You will then pass these skills on to your team so that they can optimally select and train their own teams of students. You have an eye for the talents and potentials in your team and manage to optimally promote and develop them through continuous support. You set the goals for your colleagues so that their performance is objectively traceable, support them in achieving the agreed results and are then responsible for their performance evaluation.  
- **Activate the "Local Pride"**
Every local consumer and media landscape has its own needs and peculiarities. You have the right feeling for this and support local key events and initiatives that focus on participation. Every contact with our brand becomes an unforgettable experience thanks to your first-class planning, execution and your attention to detail. In all of this, you always keep an eye on consumers and the brand and ensure that we reach our target group online in the most effective way. Not only at our own but also at selected third-party events, you increase the visibility of our brand and determine the ideal level of brand support and branding so that elyps shows the optimal presence in all relevant scenes. This is where your networking talent is needed: You build sustainable relationships with the most important players in the region. You work with opinion leaders, various media and local authorities, as well as with entrepreneurs and start-up communities and always manage to keep an overview.  
- **Marketing innovations**
Standstill is a foreign word for you. You are always on the move, keep up with the times and understand the latest trends. It is particularly important to you to be close to the consumer, which is why you can easily make contacts in a wide variety of scenes. You involve the local student marketing team in the brainstorming process on the spot and are close to campus life with them to track down digitally and socially motivated consumer trends and integrate them into your strategies. You also think outside the box and create new, innovative ideas to bring the brand to life. You make sure that digital and social media are at the center of every field marketing activity.

Your Experience
- You already have demonstrable experience in marketing, ideally in the sports, event or culture area. Your heart beats especially for field marketing.
- You have also gained extensive experience in people management and have acquired expertise in hiring, training and motivating team leadership.
- Ideally, you have already worked with commercial teams in sales or trade marketing.
- You know how to negotiate and manage budgets.
- You are strong in networking - with your excellent communication skills you can inspire people and open doors.
- As a multi-tasking talent, you keep many balls in the air at the same time and can effortlessly work with different personalities from different fields.
- You are a real leader and a talent when it comes to organise and manage an event.
- You have a good understanding of current consumer trends and insights in the tech, sports and culture area in your region.
- You are a real marketing talent with a deep understanding of brand and a spirit of innovation in your blood. You like to implement your ideas proactively and quickly.
- Thanks to your talent for communication, it is easy for you to hold presentations in front of an audience and to adapt to your audience again and again.
  
- Successfully completed studies in marketing, business administration, event management or similar
- You are a native French/Dutch speaker.
- Fluent in written and spoken English.
- Travel up to: 80%


Compensation & Benefits
- **Package : 70,000 ‚Ç¨ - 100,000 ‚Ç¨** 
- Our gross salary range for the role is 35,000 ‚Ç¨ - 50,000 ‚Ç¨ per annum depending on experience
- Stock Options: We double your gross salary with stock options
- Biannual equity bonuses
- The latest Apple MacBook and 27' screen with comfort view
- Roll with a free elyps Premium subscription
- 1 day of remote work per week
- 5 to 10 days off in addition to the statutory holidays
- Pension plan
- Private Health Insurance
- Relocation package and visa sponsorship for international talents (we already have 8+ nationalities)
- Additional employee benefits coming soon


Hiring Process
- Video-call interview with our talent acquisition manager (30 min approx.)
- Video-call interview with your future manager (45 min. approx.)
- A home-task / Business case challenge to evaluate your hard skills¬†
- Onsite interviews with future team members (1:30 hours approx.)
- Meeting with Founders
- Offer follows within 48 hours

elyps has a growing-team working behind the scene with an extensive experience in financial services and the expertise of successfully dealing with the pains of scaling high-growth tech products.

You will be working in a fast-paced environment with talented and ambitious people, all passionate in taking part of building a game-changing company that impacts positively on people‚Äôs lives. We are devoted to build a diverse work environment where our employees are motivated and proud every single day.

- You will get the great opportunity to be responsible for our marketplace in Belgium by driving the business development strategy from the B2B side by sealing deals with partners in order to empower our users' lifestyle.
- You will maximise the sales performance by establishing strong relationships and gaining insight into the needs and lifestyle of Elyps users.
- You will launch and test new outbound lead generation channels and determine how best to scale them, adjusting your sales strategy based on interactions and results in the field.
- You will represent Elyps as a brand ambassador, with a comprehensive understanding of our product offering.
- You will deliver thought leadership and publicly represent Elyps' community in France through presentations at events such as FinTech conferences, participate on topic panels, content creation (e.g. blog posts), and other mediums.
- You will continuously explore new ways to engage with our growing community of partners, being at the forefront of a rapidly changing digital environment.

- Experience in B2B sales roles, ideally in fast-growing companies within the Tech and/or internet industry.
- You will consider yourself an achiever and you‚Äôll have a strong and consistent track record of performance against targets.

- You will lead negotiations with partners to maximize the value captured by Elyps.
- You will define the allocation mechanisms to trigger Elyps' compensation.
- You will manage technical development allowing the integration of partners within the Market.
- You will participate in reflections related to market product evolution.
- You will manage marketing actions promoting the adoption of the proposed features.
- You will manage product improvement projects for Market functionalities, in collaboration with Elyps partners and technical teams.
- You will report on market performance and developments to the Elyps management team.
- You will define the procedures to be followed by Customer Service to deal with user requests relating to Market functionalities.
- You will ensure the operational management of partnerships.
- You are happy to represent Elyps in public and you will ensure that we build a positive reputation.
- You are commercially minded, seek to understand the business needs and are always aiming to add value.
- You are a native French speaker with a very good command of English, knowledge of Dutch is a plus.
- You‚Äôre comfortable working in a scaling business, where time is critical, and things change on a regular basis.
- You take ownership of what you are working on, feel responsible for it and are able to deliver results in a fast-paced entrepreneurial environment without constant supervision.

Soon after having met the Belgian financial authorities to create a new kind of bank, late 2017, Mat, a Mobile & Fintech specialist joined Vincent to found elyps. elyps, what is it?¬†

elyps is the first community-driven payment account, by invite-only, bringing together a community of members who want to have a positive climate impact.¬†¬†

‚Ä¢ Upon registration, all members become shareholders, for free

‚Ä¢ Focus fully on our members‚Äô needs
‚Ä¢ Commit to an end to end compelling brand and product experience
‚Ä¢ Do everything possible to save our members‚Äô time and improve their lifestyle¬†
‚Ä¢ Offer free equity to members to further build trust in our brand and product
‚Ä¢ Gather a community around a common mission: to have a positive climate impact
‚Ä¢ Exceed our mutual targets through our shared enthusiasm and over deliver

The main objective of a Student Ambassador is to increase the number of members and the awareness of the elyps brand on university campuses.

‚Ä¢ driving a positive brand image on campus and in its region

‚Ä¢ building long term loyalty and creating the ultimate elyps brand college experience

Student Ambassadors will drive acquisition by sending invitations to test the product or by representing elyps at campus events to ensure an unforgettable brand experience.¬† Student Ambassadors will work in a flexible and agile way, in a creative environment.

- invite and convince your fellow students, friends, family and everyone you know to adopt elyps.
- be responsible for driving the whole cycle: prospecting, acquisition and retention
- help build and deploy a strategy so that a maximum of people adopt elyps and are able to pay everywhere with the elyps app
- be an elyps brand ambassador, with a deep understanding of our product offering and benefits

- **Brand and product ambassador** ‚ö°
- Promote and showcase the elyps brand through daily interactions with members and potential members
- Be a brand and product expert and know the ins and outs of all our product features and our brand values
- Develop the member base by inviting consumers to test the product in the right place, at the right time - comfortably and accurately be able to answer all their queries
- Build a great network, establish and maintain relationships with key local businesses and student groups
- Create brand content and interest on your social networks¬†
- Look for opportunities to include elyps at local events and ensure you provide an unforgettable brand experience
- Share ideas and collaborate with the wider team through regular interactions
- Plan and report your activities via the dedicated elyps online tools on a regular and accurate basis.
- Contribute to the development of elyps‚Äô marketplace by providing information on local trends, providers and opportunities.
  
- **Campus Mission** ‚ö°
- Identify key ‚Äòmust-win‚Äô groups and influencers on campus to build brand loyalty and awareness
- Build and execute an innovative, tailor-made campus plan to engage both undergraduate and graduate students by bringing our brand to life
- One-on-one trials to encourage members to adopt elyps VISA cards
- Associate our brand with unique on-campus experiences and other third-party events that share our values
- Build relationships with key campus media
- Follow event/activity/training guidelines to ensure quality execution in aspects of the role


The ideal ambassador ü§©
- You‚Äôre a digital native, with excellent communication skills
- You‚Äôre charismatic, energetic, with a positive and outgoing personality
- You‚Äôre naturally easy going, friendly and¬† sociable and find it easy to connect with a wide variety of people
- You‚Äôre fully immersed into student life and activities on campus with a good understanding of the university, the city and the region
- You are brimming with energy, enthusiasm and creative ideas¬†
- You have a keen sense of responsibility and enjoy taking initiatives
- You‚Äôre able to combine part-time work and studies, and are available to work¬† some evenings and weekends
- You would love to learn about and practice a new range of skills in marketing, negotiation, communication and sales
- You‚Äôre well connected with a variety of¬† active influential groups and campus members, both online and offline
- You‚Äôre active on social media platforms
- You‚Äôre interested and passionate about start-ups, the tech industry and in particular fintechs
- You care about the planet and you‚Äôre keen to have a positive environmental impact
- Languages preferred: French,¬† Dutch, English


Hiring Process
- Video-call interview with our talent acquisition manager (30 min approx.)
- At home-task / Business case challenge to evaluate your hard skills¬†
- 2nd interview to present your task
- Offer follows within 48 hours


What about the elyps team ? üíö
By joining us, you will be working in a fast-paced environment with talented and ambitious people, all passionate about taking part in building a game-changing company that impacts positively on people‚Äôs lives as well as the environment. 
We are devoted to build a diverse work environment where our employees are motivated and proud to work for elyps every single day.¬†

If you‚Äôd like to be part of the adventure, please send us your application. 

We look forward to hearing from you!¬†

Think out of the bank!
